description: Samuel is a stud we met at a club.We spotted a group of women admiring him, so we knew he'd be a perfect Next Door Male. When we decided to walk up to Samuel, it was pretty clear that he was a confident, well-spoken person.He was immediately interested in getting into some online nude fun.Samuel is really a nice guy, who is a blast to work with. He also knows how to put on a very hot show. Enjoy!
title: Samuel
